House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08020
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO ENHANCE INTER-LGU COOPERATION BY AMENDING CERTAIN PROVISIONS IN BOOK I OF REPUBLIC ACT 7160, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT CODE OF 1991
ABSTRACT : Provides that local government units may group themselves and coordinate their efforts and resources by forming an alliance and obtain legal personality. Establishes a National Registry of Alliances to register the alliance of LGUs and establish the legal personality and all the consequent implications of the same.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-08-06
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
